title: Sold to the Trillionaires
description: In the distant future, women are a rare prize known only to the extremely rich. When a young woman is caught in a compromising situation, she's forced accept the consequences and leave the community she grew up in. Sold to the highest bidders, four trillionaires take claim to Amber, enjoying her while they help to repopulate the earth. She has a hard time seeing marriage to four sexy, rich men as a punishment, but it's not all fun and games when jealousy takes hold of two of her new husbands. Can she satisfy the men and keep her new family together?
author: Ella Mansfield
